org.roug.osnine

Class USim

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.roug.osnine.USim
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    USimIntel, USimMotorola

    public abstract class USim
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Generic processor run state routines.
